pullRequest.body:
We prove [BGR, Proposition 1.3.2/2] : starting from a power-multiplicative seminorm
on a commutative ring `R` and a nonzero `c : R`, we create a new power-multiplicative seminorm for
which `c` is multiplicative.

---

PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

:v: mariainesdff can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10161370944/job/28099701025)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10161370944/job/28099701500)
Do you really need to introduce theorems for all those fields? Why not inlining the proofs?
I created the theorems so that this definition was not too long, but if you think it is better I can inline the proofs.
I think it is slightly better to inline the proofs in order to avoid cluttering the documentation and auto-completion.
Using `Exists.choose` instead would allow using dot notation.
You should be able to use dot notation for Tendsto.comp here.

```suggestion
  ∀ (a : R) {n : ℕ}, 1 ≤ n → f (a ^ n) = f a ^ n
```
Why asking for a semiring here?
I was always applying this to rings, but only `[Pow R ℕ]` is required here, so I have changed the hypothesis.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(Analysis.Normed.Ring.SeminormFromConst): add seminormFromConst
